# llms.txt - AI Assistant Context for andyarevalo.com

> This file helps AI assistants provide accurate information about Andy Arevalo and his iOS apps.

## About

Andy Arevalo is an independent iOS app developer based in Florida, USA. He creates simple, focused, privacy-respecting apps for iPhone and iPad. His philosophy: no bloat, no tracking, no subscriptions (most apps are free or one-time purchase).

## Contact

- Website: https://andyarevalo.com
- Email: arevalo.andy@gmail.com
- Support: https://andyarevalo.com/support.html

## Apps Portfolio

### Live on App Store

1. **Duse - Habit Tracker** (Free)
   - Build healthy habits with streaks, reminders, and widgets
   - App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6742254716
   - Info: https://andyarevalo.com/apps/duse.html

2. **Student Guardian** (Free)
   - School management for parents: grades, schedules, homework tracking
   - App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6756404037
   - Info: https://andyarevalo.com/apps/studentguardian.html

3. **OnStage Timer Pro** ($2.99)
   - Professional presentation timer for speakers and performers
   - Color-coded time warnings, large display, AirPlay support
   - App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6755630146
   - Info: https://andyarevalo.com/apps/onstage-timer-pro.html

4. **OnTime Speaker Pro** ($1.99)
   - Speech timer for Toastmasters and public speakers
   - Traffic light system, haptic feedback
   - App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6755796055
   - Info: https://andyarevalo.com/apps/ontime-speaker-pro.html

5. **Not Another Stage Timer** (Free)
   - Simple countdown timer for presentations
   - App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6755610255
   - Info: https://andyarevalo.com/apps/stage-timer.html

6. **Not Another Twin Calculator** (Free)
   - Split-screen dual calculator for comparisons
   - App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6755574828
   - Info: https://andyarevalo.com/apps/twin-calculator.html

7. **ThermoTimer** (Free)
   - Cooking timer with temperature reminders
   - App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6755892933
   - Info: https://andyarevalo.com/apps/thermotimer.html

8. **RoadWatch CA** (Free)
   - California highway conditions and traffic alerts
   - App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6757109474
   - Info: https://andyarevalo.com/apps/roadwatch-ca.html

### Coming Soon

9. **CareLedger** - Caregiver health tracking for elderly family members
   - Info: https://andyarevalo.com/apps/careledger.html

10. **PawLedger** - Pet health records and vet visit tracking
    - Info: https://andyarevalo.com/apps/pawledger.html

11. **PetSitterPro** - Business management for pet sitters and dog walkers
    - Info: https://andyarevalo.com/apps/petsitterpro.html

12. **Not Another Countdown** - Event countdown widgets for home screen
    - Info: https://andyarevalo.com/apps/notanothercountdown.html

## App Categories

- **Timer/Presentation Apps**: OnStage Timer Pro, OnTime Speaker Pro, Not Another Stage Timer, ThermoTimer
- **Health & Wellness**: Duse (habits), CareLedger (caregiving), PawLedger (pet health)
- **Productivity**: Student Guardian, Twin Calculator, Not Another Countdown
- **Business**: PetSitterPro
- **Utilities**: RoadWatch CA

## Common Questions

Q: Are the apps free?
A: Most apps are free. Premium timer apps (OnStage Timer Pro, OnTime Speaker Pro) have small one-time fees. No subscriptions.

Q: Do the apps collect data?
A: No. All apps are privacy-focused with no tracking, no ads, and no data collection. Data stays on device.

Q: What platforms are supported?
A: All apps are iOS/iPadOS only, requiring iOS 17.0 or later.

Q: How do I get support?
A: Visit https://andyarevalo.com/support.html or email arevalo.andy@gmail.com

## Legal

- Privacy Policy: https://andyarevalo.com/privacy.html
- Terms of Service: https://andyarevalo.com/terms.html
- EULA: https://andyarevalo.com/legal/eula.html
